Title: SharePoint Search Bench
Description: SharePoint Search Bench contains a desktop app for testing and executing searches against a Microsoft Office Search Server (MOSS) environment and a .NET class library API for developers to execute searches homogeneously across both the Search web service or object model.
HomeWiki:
Version 2.0 has been released!

Click the Releases tab to download the new version. The main change in this release is the fix of a bug in the app when making web service calls from a non-SharePoint computer (Microsoft.Office dll's were required on the calling computer). This is a major version change because the API contains breaking changes for this fix.

Project Description

SharePoint Search Bench contains a desktop app for testing and executing searches against a Microsoft Office Search Server (MOSS) environment and a .NET class library API for developers to execute searches homogeneously across both the Search web service or object model.

Aids and References

  • SharePoint Search Bench API Guide
  • Example Full Text SQL queries
  • Writing SQL Syntax Queries for Relevant Results in Enterprise Search: http://msdn2.microsoft.com/en-us/library/bb219479.aspx
  • QueryPacket / Schema for Enterprise Search (search web service): http://msdn2.microsoft.com/en-us/library/ms563775.aspx

System Requirements

  • Microsoft Office SharePoint Server (MOSS). WSS only is not enough!
  • .NET 3.5 (for running the desktop application)
